text: Bernie Shannon (12 February 1929 – 19 February 2014)SHANNON, Bernard Leslie was an Australian rules footballer who played for the Collingwood Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Bernie Shannon
